part.content: Part II : Business Of Banking Companies. Sec. 6 - 36A.
Part IIA : Control Over Management Sec. 36AA - 36AC.
Part IIB : Prohibition Of Certain Activities In Relation To Banking Companies. Sec. 36AD.
Part IIC : Acquisition Of The Undertakings Of Banking Companies In Certain Cases. Sec. 36AE - 36AJ.
Part III : Suspension Of Business And Winding Up Of Banking Companies. Sec. 36B - 45.
Part IIIA : Special Provisions For Speedy Disposal Of Winding Up Proceedings. Sec. 45A - 45X.
Part IIIB : Provisions Relating To Certain Operations Of Banking Companies. Sec. 45Y - 45ZF.
Part V : Application Of The Act To Co-Operative Banks. Sec. 56.
